metadata.title: CVE-2022-1802 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: If an attacker was able to corrupt the methods of an Array object inJavaScript via prototype pollution, they could have achieved execution ofattacker-controlled JavaScript code in a privileged context. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 91.9.1, Firefox < 100.0.2, Firefox forAndroid < 100.3.0, and Thunderbird < 91.9.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
